class.name: GraphNode
class.brief_description: A GraphNode is a container with several input and output slots allowing connections between GraphNodes. Slots can have different, incompatible types.
class.description: A GraphNode is a container defined by a title. It can have one or more input and output slots, which can be enabled (shown) or disabled (not shown) and have different (incompatible) types. Colors can also be assigned to slots. A tuple of input and output slots is defined for each GUI element included in the GraphNode. Input and output connections are left and right slots, but only enabled slots are counted as connections.

method.name: clear_all_slots
method.description: Disables all input and output slots of the GraphNode.

method.name: clear_slot
method.description: Disables input and output slot whose index is [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_connection_input_color
method.description: Returns the color of the input connection [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_connection_input_count
method.description: Returns the number of enabled input slots (connections) to the GraphNode.

method.name: get_connection_input_position
method.description: Returns the position of the input connection [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_connection_input_type
method.description: Returns the type of the input connection [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_connection_output_color
method.description: Returns the color of the output connection [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_connection_output_count
method.description: Returns the number of enabled output slots (connections) of the GraphNode.

method.name: get_connection_output_position
method.description: Returns the position of the output connection [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_connection_output_type
method.description: Returns the type of the output connection [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_slot_color_left
method.description: Returns the color set to [code]idx[/code] left (input) slot.

method.name: get_slot_color_right
method.description: Returns the color set to [code]idx[/code] right (output) slot.

method.name: get_slot_type_left
method.description: Returns the (integer) type of left (input) [code]idx[/code] slot.

method.name: get_slot_type_right
method.description: Returns the (integer) type of right (output) [code]idx[/code] slot.

method.name: is_slot_enabled_left
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if left (input) slot [code]idx[/code] is enabled, [code]false[/code] otherwise.

method.name: is_slot_enabled_right
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if right (output) slot [code]idx[/code] is enabled, [code]false[/code] otherwise.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the GraphNode is a comment node.
The offset of the GraphNode, relative to the scroll offset of the [GraphEdit]. [b]Note:[/b] You cannot use position directly, as [GraphEdit] is a [Container].

signal.name: close_request
signal.description: Signal sent on closing the GraphNode.

signal.name: dragged
signal.description: Signal sent when the GraphNode is dragged.

signal.name: offset_changed
signal.description: Signal sent when the GraphNode is moved.

signal.name: raise_request
signal.description: Signal sent when the GraphNode is requested to be displayed over other ones. Happens on focusing (clicking into) the GraphNode.
